element.short: proposed | accepted | planned | in-progress | on-target | ahead-of-target | behind-target | sustaining | achieved | on-hold | cancelled | entered-in-error | rejected
element.definition: Indicates whether the goal has been reached and is still considered relevant.
element.comment: This element is labeled as a modifier because the status contains codes that mark the resource as not currently valid.
element.requirements: Allows measuring outcome and whether goal needs to be further tracked.

binding.description: Indicates whether the goal has been met and is still being targeted

mapping.map: .statusCode in-progress = active (classCode = OBJ) achieved = complete sustaining = active (classCode=OBJC) cancelled = aborted
